Title: SCSM Service Request
Description: The Service Request project defines a new work item class called 'Service Request' and the corresponding form for that work item class.  It is a good example of using custom XAML controls in a custom form and of how to localize content for forms.
HomeWiki: This project provides a Work Item class model for Service Requests and a form for creating/editing service requests. This is primarily a projec to show how to create custom models and forms which use custom form controls. The project itself is fully usable though as a solution.
